title: Franchise value of the Oakland Raiders ( NFL ) 2002 to 2019
yAxis: Franchise value in million U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Franchise value in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2007, and lastly roughly decreasing from 2007 to 2010.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2006 and 2007.
Maximum Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, about 861.0 was reported at Year 2008
The lowest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 676.0 was reported at Year 2005
